charges.charge_description: Did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute approximately 2.9 kilograms of a mixture or substance containing a detectable amount of cocaine-21 USC 841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B). Date of Offense: 5/10/04. PENALTY: Not less than 5 years nor more than 40 years imprisonment without probation, parole, or suspended sentence, a fine of up to $2 million, at least 4 years SRT, a $100.00 Special Assessment, and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (1)

Knowingly, intentionally, and unlawfully possessed a controlled substance, with intent to distribute, in Schedule II of the Controlled Substance Act of 1970, to wit: 6.4 pounds of cocaine (approximate gross weight) in violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1). [2:04-m-314]
